description: This file implements two functions, WebRloEngage and WebRloCancel, which manage the activation state of a Web Resource Locator object, part of a web server/client/application module. The functions modify the 'bActive' boolean member of the object to indicate activity status.

classes.name: WEB_RESOURCE_LOCATOR_OBJECT
classes.description: A structure representing the Web Resource Locator object, which includes at least a boolean 'bActive' member controlling its activity state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRloEngage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Activates the Web Resource Locator object by setting its 'bActive' flag to TRUE.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebRloCancel(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Deactivates the Web Resource Locator object by setting its 'bActive' flag to FALSE.
